Test Cases: Manager successfully submit the customer data after entering valid data in the "Edit Customer" fields
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the manager
Expected Result: The manager successfully edited the customer data
Actual Result: The customer data successfully updated, but an error message "No Changes made to Customer records" shown

Test Cases: Manager can't edit the customer data while all or any of the required fields is empty
Test Steps: 1) Don't enter any data in all the new account fields
Expected Result: An error message on all the required fields must shown
Actual Result: An error message on all the required fields must shown
